title: (x) Marc Ecko logo - Trade Gothic {Pieter}
content:
I am after the typeface that is used to write “marc ecko” in this image. Anyone know it?  
 [http://www.aggressivemall.com/PhotoGallery.asp?ProductCode=ECKO%2DWATCH%...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227152847/http:/www.aggressivemall.com/PhotoGallery.asp?ProductCode=ECKO%2DWATCH%2DE15025G1 "http://www.aggressivemall.com/PhotoGallery.asp?ProductCode=ECKO%2DWATCH%2DE15025G1")

cheers,

Nick

 [‹ (x) "Day of Silence" chunky '70s-style narrow sans - House Gothic 23 {Stephen L}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227152847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32543 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "student profiles" techno sans - Pasadena {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227152847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21498 "Go to next forum topic")
author: N Cooke

comments.content:
Hello Nick,

I looks very much like Trade Gothic Bold Condensed No 20.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227152847/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/")

Pieter
Thanks a lot Pieter, much appreciated.

Nick, I’m sorry but you’re going to have to change your name to avoid confusion! ;^)

I was here first. You can be Oznik.

Nick Cooke
Oh no, _another_ Nick C! This is getting really confusing; :^P
